price: Dũkiya da ɗiya,* sũ ne ƙawar rãyuwar dũniya, kuma ayyuka mãsu wanzuwa na ƙwarai sun fi zama alhẽri a wurin Ubangijinka ga lãda kuma sun fi alhẽri ga bũri.
arabic: ٱلۡمَالُ وَٱلۡبَنُونَ زِينَةُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَٱلۡبَٰقِيَٰتُ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتُ خَيۡرٌ عِندَ رَبِّكَ ثَوَابٗا وَخَيۡرٌ أَمَلٗا
footnotes: * Dũkiya da ɗiya, ƙawar dũniya ne, idan suka zama abin alfahari ga mai su, amma idan an ciyar da dũkiya ga tafarkin Allah, kuma aka karantar da ɗiya ga bisa tafarkin hanyar sharĩ'a suka tãshi Musulmin ƙwarai, to, sun zama aikin sharĩ'a na Lãhira kħ nan.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: al-mālu wal-banūna zīnatu al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wal-bāqiyātu al-ṣāliḥātu khayrun ʿinda rabbika thawāban wakhayrun amalan
